Australia - arid.sowing:
Easy to grow.  Plant pieces of rhizome or roots 8 - 10 cm (3 - 4 in.) deep. 
				Best planted at soil temperatures between 5°C and 20°C.
Australia - arid.harvest: Harvest in approximately 1 years. You will have a stronger plant if you leave it for about a year before using..
Australia - arid.companion: Compatible with (can grow beside): Brassicas (Cabbage, Broccoli, Cauliflower, etc)
